column4: do any of you guys back-up your files? if so what do you use? I just need simple backup of my school files.
i'm using a Folder synchronization program, it only updates the files that have changed to my USB HD. But the program is in Java 6, Java6 is not yet install on end user desktops.
currently the program supports a bunch of synchronization/merge methods, include/exclude filters, project saving. The next version will support synchronization over SFTP.
